critique: The document is a formal amendment to an executive order regarding the payment of expenses related to the death of civilian officers and employees. It specifies the costs covered for the preparation of remains and sets a limit on the total amount allowed. There is no explicit emotional language or sentiment expressed in the document. Therefore, all emotions should be scored low, as the public is not expected to feel any strong emotion based on this document. The initial scores will be 1 for all emotions due to the lack of emotional content. Upon review, the initial scores accurately reflect the neutral tone of the document, so the revised scores will remain the same.
